backend/main.mo: Primary backend actor defining data types, state maps, authorization mixin, and service, profile, order, cart, and notification operations with ID counters.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old customer orders into expanded orders and initializing notification storage and counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend file changes, associated components, and test IDs for recent feature updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high‑level summaries of multiple frontend components, hooks, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the Tidio chat script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with themed layout and routes for all pages including protected dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication guard component that checks Internet Identity state and redirects unauthenticated users to login.
frontend/src/components/BrandFooter.tsx: Renders a footer with branding, navigation links, contact info, and a dynamic year plus referral link.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive header with navigation, login/logout handling, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/BrandLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with a header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/OtpDemoField.tsx: Provides a demo OTP generator and verification UI with state handling.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Displays a service card with icon, name, price range, delivery time, and optional action content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddToCart.ts: Offers mutations for adding items to cart and querying caller orders using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Exposes authentication state, principal, and initialization status from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/clear functions, and identity lifecycle management.
frontend/src/hooks/useServices.ts: Fetches available services from the backend using the current actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupport.ts: Handles submitting and retrieving support requests through backend actor queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and saves the caller’s user profile via backend actor interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base/theme styles with a light and dark premium gold theme and custom utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrapping the App component.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a styled contact page with email and WhatsApp links and hover effects.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays services, support requests, orders, and a prefilled order form with validation and add‑to‑cart logic.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows a marketing homepage with hero, service listings, and calls to action based on auth state.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides Internet Identity login flow with error handling and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Lists service pricing and icons and includes a payment options section with Stripe and PayPal.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Fetches services and renders cards with an Order Now action redirecting based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity signup, profile completion with validation, OTP check, and profile saving.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for a luxury-styled theme.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architectural notes, and feature definitions for the Elvra Worldwide site.
